articles.author: Padraic Halpin, Graham Fahy, Conor Humphries
articles.title: 'Dublin is safe' says Irish PM Varadkar after 34 arrested in riots - Reuters
articles.description: Calm was restored to the streets of central Dublin on Friday night amid a heavy police presence after 34 people were arrested following rioting the previous night that was triggered by the <a href="/world/europe/least-three-children-taken-hospital-after-dubli…
articles.content: DUBLIN, Nov 24 (Reuters) - Calm was restored to the streets of central Dublin on Friday night amid a heavy police presence after 34 people were arrested following rioting the previous night that was … [+5075 chars]
